/usr/bin/c++   -g    CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/datastruct/datatag.cpp.o CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/datastruct/adamtag.cpp.o CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/adam6x50/adam6x50_conf.cpp.o CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/adam6x50/adam6x50_thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/log/log.cpp.o CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/mbserver/mbserver_conf.cpp.o CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/mbserver/mbserver_thread.cpp.o CMakeFiles/homeplatform.dir/cqueue/cqueue.cpp.o  -o homeplatform -rdynamic -lpq -lpthread -lmodbus
